rows.label: qev092201_MSG0004
rows.name:
I see[ST:wide ]— You miss Earth and want to go back[ST:wide ]—
And because of that, you cry every night[ST:wide ]— is that right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0005
rows.name:
It's strange, isn't it?
What's wrong with me?[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0006
rows.name:
I feel the same longing for Earth. In fact,
it's a feeling everyone living in NLA shares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0007
rows.name:
There's nothing wrong with you.
Everyone is struggling just like you are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0008
rows.name:
I see[ST:wide ]— Even someone strong like you, Himeri-san,
feels that way[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Yes[ST:wide ]— Thank you for confiding
something so difficult to talk about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Not at all[ST:wide ]—! Thank you[ST:wide ]—
For listening to me talk like this for hours[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Not at all[ST:wide ]— If you start feeling that way again,
feel free to contact me, no matter how late it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0012
rows.name:
I hope sharing this burden will help you begin
to heal and move forward with life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0013
rows.name: Yes! Himeri-san[ST:wide ]— Thank you so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0014
rows.name: I thought that people in BLADE... were all just scary types, but[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0015
rows.name:
There are people like you!
I'm really glad I took the plunge and talked to you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0016
rows.name: Alright, next person, please—![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0017
rows.name:
[ST:wide ]—Are you here for a consultation too?
I'm very sorry to have kept you waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0010
rows.name: Ask Question

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask about Himeri's job.

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0020
rows.name: Consult

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell her you're looking for 10 natural pearls but can't find them.

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0018
rows.name:
From giving directions to dealing with heinous crimes,
and even solving relationship troubles[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0019
rows.name: That is our job as Companions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0020
rows.name:
If anything's troubling you,
please don't hesitate to tell me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Are you also in the same line of work?
Thank you for your hard work on your missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0022
rows.name:
So then[ST:wide ]— I see.
You're looking for 10 natural pearls, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0023
rows.name:
In that case, I happen to have a pearl necklace
that might work, so I'll give it to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0024
rows.name:
Himeri-chan!
Isn't that necklace a memento from your father?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0025
rows.name:
It's not my place as your assistant to interfere, but
to give away even something like that[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0026
rows.name:
It's alright[ST:wide ]— Father in heaven would surely
want it to be used for someone's happiness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0027
rows.name:
Here you go, please accept it.
Please make good use of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0028
rows.name:
If you say so, Himeri-chan[ST:wide ]—
Are you sure you're not overdoing it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0029
rows.name:
Ornela-san, you worry too much.
You're really like a mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Ever since we came to NLA,
she's been looking after me like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0031
rows.name:
[ST:wide ]—Ah! The next person
is waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0032
rows.name:
Ah, yes[ST:wide ]—
Alright then, next person please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0033
rows.name:
Hey, Himeri[ST:wide ]—
There's something I need to talk to you about privately[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0034
rows.name:
Oh my. A lot of fellow BLADEs are visiting today.
Was there some trouble with a mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0035
rows.name: No, this is about something private[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0036
rows.name:
Um, you know[ST:wide ]— These bodies of ours[ST:wide ]—
Can they[ST:wide ]— Can they bear children!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0037
rows.name: Wh—!?[ST:wide ]— Why would you ask that...?[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0038
rows.name:
Actually, I started living with a guy recently, you know?
And when we were talking[ST:wide ]— I started wanting one[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0039
rows.name:
Um[ST:wide ]— That's[ST:wide ]—
That kind of topic is outside my area of expertise[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0040
rows.name:
Ah[ST:wide ]— Um!?
Do you happen to know anything about this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0031
rows.name:
Say that first, we need to create a world
where children can live safely.

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0040
rows.name: Be Realistic

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0041
rows.name: Speak realistically, saying it's difficult given the current situation.

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0041
rows.name:
Yes, exactly!
You're very wise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0042
rows.name:
In other words, if you work hard at your missions,
Ada-san, your wish can come true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0043
rows.name:
[ST:wide ]—Right. Thinking about it that way
gives me strength for my daily work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0044
rows.name:
Yeah[ST:wide ]— Thanks as always!
And thanks for the good advice, you over there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0045
rows.name:
Phew[ST:wide ]— That was helpful.
Somehow, I'm just no good at that kind of consultation[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0046
rows.name:
Having you say it so clearly
was refreshing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0047
rows.name: This isn't the time to be worrying about things like this, is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0049
rows.name: Let's both do our best with our missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0050
rows.name:
Yeah, let's work hard! Sorry, Himeri.
I feel a bit better now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0051
rows.name:
I feel bad, having you say something
that was difficult to say[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0052
rows.name:
But I appreciate it. I didn't know
what to say[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0053
rows.name: Alright then, next person please—![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0054
rows.name:
Super urgent!
There's something I need to ask-meh!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0055
rows.name:
Oh my. What is it,
cute little alien?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0056
rows.name:
The Drongo Caravan on the Black Steel Continent
is being attacked by a terrible monster-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0057
rows.name:
Defeat that thing and
save the caravan-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0058
rows.name:
Oh, that's terrible[ST:wide ]—
But[ST:wide ]— I'm just a Companion[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0059
rows.name:
I don't have the proper equipment
to go to such a place alone[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0060
rows.name: You won't do it-meh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0060_02
rows.name:
I came all this way because I heard there was someone
who'd do anything for free![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0061
rows.name: This is fraud-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0061_2
rows.name:
At this rate,
the Drongo Caravan will be wiped out-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0062
rows.name:
Um[ST:wide ]— I want to help you, I really do.
But[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0050
rows.name: Offer Help

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0051
rows.name: Offer to help her yourself.

rows.label: qev092201_JNK0060
rows.name: Stay Silent

rows.label: qev092201_SEL0061
rows.name: Watch to see what happens.

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0063
rows.name:
You will[ST:wide ]—!?
Ah[ST:wide ]— Um, thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0064
rows.name:
Even though I knew I couldn't handle it, I just couldn't
abandon someone in such situation[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0065
rows.name:
Alright, I'm counting on you-mo!
I'll explain the details at the caravan, so hurry-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0066
rows.name:
Um[ST:wide ]— Well then, for the journey to the Black Steel Continent,
I'll be counting on your company.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0067
rows.name:
My name is Himeri Aranji.
I'll do my best not to get in the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0068
rows.name:
Then do it together with that person there-mo!
Look strong, maybe the two of you can manage it-meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0068_m
rows.name:
Then do it together with that person there-mo!
Look strong, maybe the two of you can manage it-meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0068_f
rows.name:
Then do it together with that person there-mo!
Look strong, maybe the two of you can manage it-meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0069
rows.name: Um, us? The two of us? Help you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0069_m
rows.name: Um, us? The two of us? Help you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0069_f
rows.name: Um, us? The two of us? Help you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0070
rows.name:
Alright, I'm counting on you-meh!
I'll explain the details at the caravan, so hurry-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0071
rows.name:
[ST:wide ]—This is all rather sudden, but[ST:wide ]—
If you wouldn't mind, could you perhaps come with me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0072
rows.name:
I'm asking you too. Now that things are like this, this girl
will go even if it's impossible for her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0073
rows.name:
Please.
I'll do my best not to be a burden[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092201_MSG0074
rows.name: Let's save the Nopons' caravan together.[ST:wait ]
